localResource.name: monthEnd
localResource.label: monthEnd
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN cast((cast($P{P_Start_Date} as date) + interval '1 month') - interval '1 day' as date) WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN cast((cast($P{P_Start_Date} as date) + interval '3 month') - interval '1 day' as date) END as display_enddate, CASE WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Monthly' THEN cast((cast($P{P_Start_Date} as date) + interval '1 month') as date) WHEN $P{P_Period} = 'Quarterly' THEN cast((cast($P{P_Start_Date} as date) + interval '3 month') as date) END as enddate;
